name: Jelly Bear Lip Mask
about: What it is:A leave-on lip mask for day or night with hyaluronic acid that delivers intense hydration, rapidly plumps the look of lips, smooths visible dry lines, and boosts shine..Skin Type:Normal and Dry.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers intense hydration to relieve the feeling of dry lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:The jelly texture lip formula goes on clear and comes in an irresistible jelly bear jar. It rapidly plumps lips up and reduces visible fine dry lines for healthier-looking lips. Use it as a lip mask or as a primer for a hydrating base before lip stick or lip gloss. Itu2019s also dermatologist tested..Clinical Results:Clinical results after 1 use:
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers intense hydration to relieve the feeling of dry lips..Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer, Dilinoleate Copolymer, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate2,Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyethylene, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Behenate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Lecithin, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Red 7 (Ci 15850)...*Hyaluronic Acid Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate (Salt Form of Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply an appropriate amount of this hydrating lip mask day or night. .-Keep a jar on your bedside table and use before bed to keep lips hydrated all night long. .-During the day, use it as a moisturizing lip primer before applying lipstick or lip gloss, or use as a lip gloss alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mask really good!! I put it every night before bed and my lips always feel moisturized throughout the next day. For people who say it doesnu2019t come with the u201cenyphen photo cardu201d, it has to come from the actual website itselfu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to use as a nighttime lip mask and have been using it for about 3 weeks. The texture is slightly thicker than the laneige mask and stays on the lips but I think this works better as a daytime balm. I don't feel like it moisturized as much as it just prevented my lips from drying out.
Didnt come with enhypen ids and that was mainly the whole reason i had bought the product so if ur a engene in the states and buy this for the pcs it doesnu2019t come with it
Excellent pour lu2019hydratation des lu00e8vres. Je recommande!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and excess so winters are brutal for me. I bought this yesterday and had such relief from my dry chapped almost split lips that I returned to Sephora to buy another to keep at work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I live in Calgary. That place is so dry having cracked lips is almost always. This is a life changer. Itu2019s hydrating and makes your lips feel soft u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_title: Cute idea, did not meet moisturizing expectations
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I was not the biggest fan of this lip product. The texture is nice and I appreciate that it is fragrance free, however, have not been impressed by the moisture levels it provides. Iu2019ve used other lip masks that I prefer over this for true overnight moisture. It just didnu2019t do it for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the product itself to the packaging, this product is a big hit for me. I received this for Christmas as I am well known to have painfully dry lips, and I couldn't be more pleased. This lip mask is smooth, soft, and nourishing. I find I can wear it during the day as well as at night as it's not nearly as thick as other masks I've tried.  (like Laneige, Nyx, Elf, Kiel's, Fenty, etc) It applies super smoothly and has no distinguishable scent but doesn't smell waxy either. My lips, after only a few days, feel less dry, have fewer flakes, and I feel like they are actually getting moisturized. I absolutely recommend this product. It's got this cute little bear packaging, too, which once emptied can be reused. It's worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So much better than Laneige. I love it so so so so much

reviews.review_title: Powerful healing and hydrating overnight lip mask

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried a lot of lip hydrators because Accutane has dried my lips out in ways Iu2019ve never imagined. This is the best one I have found so far! It actually melts into the skin and stays on throughout the night. Okay to drink water from glasses but not water bottles at night as it will leave some residue. . Heals flakey, painful, and peeling lips with a few uses.

reviews.review_title: Definitely my new go to for my lips!!

reviews.review_text: it's a super cute lip mask but I think the product itself is kinda mid. It's very balmy and feels good on but i didnt see or feel a difference in the morning. the first time i used it, i used a touch too much and it collected on the inside of my lips and looked really gross. i dont like that it is unscented. it makes it kind of less enjoyable to use. i also wish it came with a built in applicator so that it's more hygienic to use. the only thing I like about this is the packaging design. the ears make it easier to open and close. I wish the bottom was made of the same clear plastic bc the smooth frosted plastic made it harder to grip when opening/closing.

reviews.review_text: Wow! This lip mask has blown me away! It is super hydrating and non sticky. I love that is has multi-uses. I like to wear it just as a lip gloss, as it is so shiny and non sticky. It also works great under lipgloss. This lip mask visibly plumps, hydrates, and reduced the appearance of fine lines. This lip mask has just become my go to product. I use it literally 3 times a day! This was offered by drjart.

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing lip balm that feels so luxurious. It's arguably better than the Laneige Lip Sleeping mask which is my personal favorite. The Enhypen photo cards were pretty small which was a bit disappointing, but I overall really just love the lip balm in general. I would highly recommend! It's unscented and not flavored. There is no tingling effect but it does slightly plump. It's pretty decent sized, and fits about most of my palm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The collab is so cute, I love the packaging and the lip mask! One thing I would like to say is that the cards are very mini, still very cute but I was definitely expecting them to be photocard sized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Vital Hydra Solution Jelly Bear Lip Mask itu2019s a part of their collaboration with ENHYPEN, and Iu2019m loving it! The texture is incredibly soft and jelly-like, making it super comfortable to wear. It provides an intense burst of hydration, leaving my lips feeling soft and plump. I appreciate how it helps to soothe dryness and any rough patches, making it perfect for everyday use. Plus, the cute packaging is a bonus! This lip mask has quickly become a staple in my lip care routine.gifted by drjart

reviews.review_text: The fact that the packaging of this lip mask is too cute makes this product even better. The mask itself is very hydrating and makes my lips super soft. I love applying it at night and waking up to soft and moisturized lips in the morning! This lip mask was gifted by drjart

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how hydrating this lip mask is! I notice my lips look a bit plumper when using it too, and I donu2019t feel an uncomfortable sensation due to the plumping. It gives my lips a shiny, supple appearance. I think the bear packaging is so adorable too and I love that when you close it it actually locks into place so you know itu2019s closed. Gifted by Dr. Jart

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip jelly is so soothing on dry lips instant hydration, and stays on for such a long time which I absolutely love. I also love how it makes my lips look so shiny and glossy. This is such a must have. Gifted by Dr jart

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just the cutest lip mask ever! I love the little bear shape and it smells seriously so good, like candy! Iu2019ve never seen Dr Jart come out with a lip product so I was very excited to try this. Itu2019s super compact and easy to bring along with me anywhere, and leaves my lips perfectly hydrated! Gifted by Drjart.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Dr. Jart this Vital Hydra Solution Jelly Bear Lip Mask and I absolutely love it! Iu2019ve used many lip masks and this is my new favorite. I love putting on a lip mask before I go to bed and Iu2019ve been using this one and my lips feel so moisturized and hydrated! A lot of lip masks make my lips crack and peel but this one has not. Itu2019s not sticky at all but looks glossy and pretty on the lips which I love. The container is also absolutely adorable, itu2019s in the shape of a blue bear! And the color of the lip mask is a pretty light pink shade. I definitely recommend trying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Dr Jarts new Jelly Bear Lip mask! We have got to talk about the packaging..SOOOO CUTE!! The product itself works amazing. It intensely hydrates my lips, leaving them soft, smooth and super hydrated. I've also noticed my lips are smoother! It adds a subtle shine too! This is definitely one of my favorite lip masks now! Gifted by Dr.Jart!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip mask is so hydrating! The packaging is also so cute! I love that itu2019s not scented or flavored and that it is the perfect addition to any nighttime or morning routine. This is a perfect gift for yourself or a friend! Offered by drjart
